title: Craving U
description: The full-length version of SOCCER SWEETHEART was originally self-published June 19, 2014, as “Craving U” under the pen name Llarjme. A heartfelt debut novel with emotional ups and downs, where the story goes along with the main characters growth; it’s not instalove.Juvenile Fiction / Love & Romance, ages 13+It took many drafts to get to the final book version. After its initial publication, the author has continued to make revisions to create a story that grabs readers from the very first page and keeps them hooked until the end. Feedback from betas, bloggers and readers proved so precious to make the novel a story that involves the reader from the very beginning. The title changed several times — from Craving U to The Rook Crew to Every Boy is a Book before SOCCER SWEETHEART was finally chosen — because "Craving U" might have misled readers about the point of the story: it sounds too generic, too nondescript, too adult.
author: Mirella Muffarotto
